room_title: Escape room "Sherlock" by Out Of Time Escape in Charlotte
review: We had a blast in the Sherlock escape room. It was hard, but really well done and they gave clues in real time. Very friendly staff!!

room_title: Escape room "Sherlock" by Out Of Time Escape in Charlotte
review: We loved the Sherlock room and it was fun, challenging and interesting. The staff was helpful and easy to deal with. The facility was clean and the rooms were well done.

room_title: Escape room "Sherlock" by Out Of Time Escape in Charlotte
review: Such a fun group outing. I went with a group of friends, but I can see how this would be greatly beneficial for a work or company outing. The rooms are fantastic, and decorated greatly with detail. All of the themes they offer are wonderful too. We tried the Sherlock Holmes theme, which is supposed to be the toughest. I can't wait to go try the other rooms, and take visiting family here. Definitely worth the money and hour of your time for a great experience of teamwork, critical thinking and puzzle solving!
